amendment.description: To strike the provisions relating to development of a private flood insurance market.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1108 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cassidy. (consideration: CR S6232; text: CR S6205) To strike the provisions relating to development of a private flood insurance market.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1108 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cassidy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
